short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool for web designers/developers to overlay a grid on any website with custom columns, colors and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
v1.0:
- New design
- Add color picker for columns color
- Update to latest manifest version
- Fix an error with settings not saving correctly and grid not displaying.

v0.2:
- Minor fixes

v0.1:
- First release.

If you have an issue, recommendation, tip or opinion: hola@medina.dev
